bibl.title: The Fragments of Timotheus of Miletus. (Oxford Classical Monographs.)
bibl.note: D.Phil. Thesis, Oxford, 1998. - Introduction: I. Timotheus of Miletus; - II. Genre; - III. Music and Style; - IV. Language; - V. Metre and Prosody; - VI. The Papyrus [P. Berol. Inv. 9875 (= Pack2 1537)]; - VII. Timotheus in Antiquity. - Text. - Commentary. - Index Locorum. General Index.
bibl.seg: HORDERN J.H. (Edited with an Introduction and Commentary by), The Fragments of Timotheus of Miletus. (Oxford Classical Monographs.)
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 2002, 8°, xxii-266 pp. ISBN 0-19-924-694-7. £45.
